title: Kalpataru Projects International, arms bag orders worth Rs 2,445 cr
description: Kalpataru Projects International wins Rs 2,445 crore orders with a major focus on Transmission & Distribution business. CEO optimistic about national transmission system growth, highlighting projects in various sectors across numerous countries.
